attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scotland has Scots.
Wales has Welsh.
Northern Ireland has Northern Irish.
England has ( British )?
The majority of us are "English" we should be refered to as England and English NOT United Kingdom and British We have as much pride in our roots as every one else.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
